model_solution:
Distributive Property:
x(x(1 + x) + 2x) = x(x + x^2 + 2x)
x(x + x^2 + 2x) - 3(x^2 - x + 2)
Combine like terms:
x(x + x^2 + 2x) - 3(x^2 - x + 2) = x^3 + x^2 + 2x^2 + 2x - 3x^2 + 3x - 6
x^3 + x^2 + 2x^2 + 2x - 3x^2 + 3x - 6 = x^3 + (1 + 2 - 3)x^2 + (2 + 3)x - 6
x^3 + (1 + 2 - 3)x^2 + (2 + 3)x - 6 = x^3 + (-1)x^2 + (5)x - 6
x^3 + (-1)x^2 + (5)x - 6 = x^3 - x^2 + 5x - 6
x^3 - x^2 + 5x - 6
No additional steps are required, as the expression has been fully expanded and simplified. Final Answer
